owner.description: The owner of the Dys name

amount.description: The amount of coins to mint in the format "[amount] [denom]".   Each coin costs 1 gas.

MsgMintCoins.title: Msg Mint Coins
MsgMintCoins.description: Mint coins with a denom of a name or subname. For example if you own the name "example.dys" you can mint coins with the denom "example.dys" or "subname.example.dys"
